101.description: Declined - The request is missing one or more fields

102.description: Declined - One or more fields in the request contains invalid data

104.description: Declined - The merchantReferenceCode sent with this authorization request matches the merchantReferenceCode of another authorization request that you sent in the last 15 minutes.

151.description: Error - The request was received but there was a server timeout. This error does not include timeouts between the client and the server.

152.description: Error: The request was received, but a service did not finish running in time.

200.description: Soft Decline - The authorization request was approved by the issuing bank but declined by CyberSource because it did not pass the Address Verification Service (AVS) check.

201.description: Decline - The issuing bank has questions about the request. You do not receive an authorization code programmatically, but you might receive one verbally by calling the processor.

202.description:
Decline - Expired card. You might also receive this if the expiration date you provided does not match the date the issuing bank has on file.

Note: The ccCreditService does not check the expiration date; instead, it passes the request to the payment processor. If the payment processor allows issuance of credits to expired cards, CyberSource does not limit this functionality.

203.description: Decline - General decline of the card. No other information provided by the issuing bank.

204.description: Decline - Insufficient funds in the account.

208.description: Decline - Inactive card or card not authorized for card-not-present transactions.

209.description: Decline - American Express Card Identification Digits (CID) did not match.

210.description: Decline - The card has reached the credit limit.

221.description: Decline - The customer matched an entry on the processor's negative file.

230.description: Soft Decline - The authorization request was approved by the issuing bank but declined by CyberSource because it did not pass the card verification number (CVN) check.

232.description: Decline - The card type is not accepted by the payment processor.

233.description: Decline - General decline by the processor.

234.description: Decline - There is a problem with your CyberSource merchant configuration.

235.description: Decline - The requested amount exceeds the originally authorized amount. Occurs, for example, if you try to capture an amount larger than the original authorization amount.

237.description: Decline - The authorization has already been reversed.

238.description: Decline - The transaction has already been settled.

239.description: Decline - The requested transaction amount must match the previous transaction amount.

240.description: Decline - The card type sent is invalid or does not correlate with the credit card number.

241.description: Decline - The referenced request id is invalid for all follow-on transactions.

242.description:
Decline - The request ID is invalid.

You requested a capture, but there is no corresponding, unused authorization record. Occurs if there was not a previously successful authorization request or if the previously successful authorization has already been used in another capture request.

243.description:
Decline - The transaction has already been settled or reversed.

This reason code is specifically for Japan.

246.description: Decline - The capture or credit is not voidable because the capture or credit information has already been submitted to your processor. Or, you requested a void for a type of transaction that cannot be voided.

247.description: Decline - You requested a credit for a capture that was previously voided.

248.description: Decline - The boleto request was declined by your processor.

250.description: Error - The request was received, but there was a timeout at the payment processor.

251.description: Decline - The Pinless Debit card's use frequency or maximum amount per use has been exceeded.

254.description: Decline - Account is prohibited from processing stand-alone refunds.

400.description: Soft Decline - Fraud score exceeds threshold.

450.description: Apartment number missing or not found.

452.description: House/Box number not found on street.

454.description: P.O. Box identifier not found or out of range.

455.description: Route service identifier not found or out of range.

456.description: Street name not found in Postal code.

457.description: Postal code not found in database.

458.description: Unable to verify or correct address.

460.description: Address match not found (no reason given)

475.description: The cardholder is enrolled in Payer Authentication. Please authenticate the cardholder before continuing with the transaction.

476.description: Encountered a Payer Authentication problem. Payer could not be authenticated.

480.description: The order is marked for review by Decision Manager

481.description: The order has been rejected by Decision Manager

520.description: Soft Decline - The authorization request was approved by the issuing bank but declined by CyberSource based on your Smart Authorization settings.

700.description: The customer matched the Denied Parties List
